original_text: While he was in Egypt, Hadad heard that David rested with his ancestors and that Joab the commander of the army was also dead. Then Hadad said to Pharaoh, “Let me go, that I may return to my own country.”
korean_text: 하닷이 애굽에 있어서 다윗이 그의 조상들과 함께 잔 것과 군대 지휘관 요압이 죽은 것을 듣고 바로에게 아뢰되 나를 보내어 내 고국으로 가게 하옵소서

sentences.original_text: Hadad heard that David rested with his ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 하닷은 다윗이 조상들과 함께 잠들었다는 소식을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: and that Joab the commander of the army was also dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 군대 사령관인 요압도 죽었다는 것을 알았습니다

sentences.original_text: that I may return to my own country
